!Fishermen's Guild Member: Around God's Cauldron, if you hunt *scarlet stakato workers, Scarlet Stakato Nobles, Tepra Scarabs, wretched mercenaries, wretched mediums, wretched arismanes, elder lavasaurus, wrethc Ashuras, or Magma Drakes*, you can get the sweet aromatic fluid the water spirits love.
